description: As humans, we long for fulfillment and rest. The satiation of these desires focuses on consuming
material objects, no matter the environmental consequences. Yet, the biblical tradition calls us
to recognize that we are ecological beings. From the way we produce food to the giftedness of the
ecosystem, all life is interdependent. This course will attend to this focus, thinking about
